page.title: 02Events in the village Ripe
page.content: There is a need to provide entertainment in the area and the countrymen have hunting shooting and fishing. The local hunt meets regularly throughout the Winter . Then there is the younger set, or pony club. The Club organises lectures and pony management classes culminating in the yealy Pony Club camp. This is a great test of endurance for the riders, their parents, camp officers and last but not least, the ponies. In the Summer the horse shows take place. They cater for every category of rider from toddlers being escorted round the ring by Mums to full scale Showjumping. Also included in the shows are driving ponies and donkeys. Driving Horses and carts is popular in the area because it is flat and the roads are quiet. Dog shows are also very popular.
